titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide that the calculation of the duty imposed on imported cherries that are provisionally preserved does not include the weight of the preservative materials of the cherries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/19/2004--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide that the calculation of the duty imposed on imported cherries that are provisionally preserved is based only on their drained weight (excluding the weight of the preservative materials).
